about.title: What Is Bitchpop? — About
about.description: Bitchpop Productions aims to create, promote, and uplift female-driven film.

press.title: In The Press
press.description: Interviews, press releases, links, and mentions.

pitch.title: Pitch Your Concept
pitch.description: Starting in 2017, Bitchpop Productions is opening its doors to you: send us your script, your idea, or your concept and we’ll review it with you.

tea-time-with-t-a.title: Tea Time With T&A
tea-time-with-t-a.description: In Tea Time With T & A, Tiarra and Athena chat all things with guests. Cats, tea, and hilarity ensue in this comedic talk show-style web series.
tea-time-with-t-a.starring: Tiarra Sulyk, Athena Russell, and guests

almost-actors.title: Almost Actors
almost-actors.description: Almost Actors is a comedic webseries based on the terrible and often hysterical archetypes you meet in acting school, created by Tiarra Sulyk, Athena Russell, and Jessica McLeod.
almost-actors.writtenBy: Tiarra Sulyk, Athena Russell, & Jessica McLeod
almost-actors.starring: Athena Russell, Tiarra Sulyk, Ben Groulx, Meaghan Hommy, Jessica McLeod, Cody Wilson, Robyn Westcott, Mark Anthony Parinas, Matt Mazur, Julian LeBlanc, Nicholas Carella

high-five-goodbye.title: High Five Goodbye
high-five-goodbye.description: At the end of their first date, April and Ben are parting ways when instead of a kiss, Ben goes in for an awkward high-five. In that moment a piece of ultra-sticky gum falls from the sky cementing their hands together. Fate just made this date a whole lot longer.
high-five-goodbye.starring: Scott Patey, Athena Russell, Tiarra Sulyk, Brandon Jason Miller, Hannah Rochelle Burr, Zia Marashi, Stephi Chin-Salvo, Kougar Vakarian, Megs Calleja

meltdown.title: The Meltdown
meltdown.description: A break up, alcohol, mental illness — it's the perfect storm. What’s your breaking point? “The Meltdown” is not currently available for public viewing; if you would like to view it, please contact us.
meltdown.starring: Tiarra Sulyk, Athena Russell, Scott Patey, Brady Roberts

condenado-league.title: The Condenado League
condenado-league.description: The Crimson Death and The Tandoori have taken over the world. The best superheroes are dead. All that remains: The Condenado League — a band of useless heroes. Should we trust them to save the day?
condenado-league.starring: Catherine Lough Haggquist, Matt Mazur, Tiarra Sulyk, Athena Russell, Jessica McLeod, Meaghan Hommy, Ben Groulx, Brian Doe, Cody Wilson, Antony Kim, Keenan Sawatsky, Jacob Harris, Erin Michell

blast-from-our-teenage-pasts.title: A Blast From Our Teenage Pasts
blast-from-our-teenage-pasts.description: Being a teenager is hard. Follow along as we pick out awkward diary entries from our teenage years and laugh at the angst, the heartbreak, and the hilarity that is growing up.
blast-from-our-teenage-pasts.starring: Athena Russell, Tiarra Sulyk, Ben Groulx, Matt Shaw, Jessica McLeod, Nicole Vicente

ex-you-cant-escape.title: The Ex You Can’t Escape
ex-you-cant-escape.description: Have you ever experience a devastating break-up that you just can't shake? Zooey certainly has - she, quite literally, can't escape.
ex-you-cant-escape.starring: Athena Russell, Tiarra Sulyk, Jenna Romanin, Madison Smith, Catherine Lough Haggquist

lactivia.title: Lactivia
lactivia.description: In this SHOTS sketch, we learn about the wonderful effects of Lactivia, the best yoghurt you could possibly eat. “It keeps you regular!”

friend-anxiety.title: Friend Anxiety
friend-anxiety.description: Today Tiarra faces the hardest struggle of her life: waiting for her friend to show up. Normally this would bring most people pleasure, but for Tiarra is only means one thing: Anxiety.

deadbeat-daddies.title: Deadbeat Daddies
deadbeat-daddies.description: Four young women discuss how wonderful their fathers are. So, so wonderful.
deadbeat-daddies.starring: Jessica McLeod, Tiarra Sulyk, Athena Russell, Gurjot Toor
